I presented this talk at the 2025 National Forum on Biological Control in Annapolis, MD. My research examined behavioral differences between *Mecinus janthinus* and *M. janthiniformis*, focusing on hybridization and its implications for sustainable biological control of yellow and Dalmatian toadflax.
